pages.title: Hooks
pages.text: Upon reaching the first simulation you will be given an $(item)Iron Hook$()$(br2)This will help you navigate the rocky terrain of the first dimension.$(br2)There are higher tier of hooks that have increased speed and can launch more hooks

pages.title: Firing a hook
pages.text: To fire a hook you must use the 'Fire Hook' keybind.$(br2)Current keybind: $(l)$(#a85426)$(k:key.hooked.fire)$()$(br2)Try not to lose your Hook since you won't be able to make another one straight away if you do happen to lose it.$(br2)Hooks only work when they are equipped as a Bauble.
While you are anchored with your $(item)Hook$() you dig at full speed. (No slowness penalty like creative flight)$(br2)Use this to your advantage.
